content.p: Every time I manually feed the 3D printer, a butterfly dies. http://youtu.be/-TmvJD_HVos

From last episode, you guys might recall that I printed with multiple colors. Well that's all fine and dandy, but when your new spool gets pulled down from the shelf, crashing into your desk and possibly ruining your print, you know you need to print a spool holder.
I briefly guide you through the build process of my own spool holder design.
